definition: young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: The problem of the older youths marriage has become an important research area.
sentences.chinese: 大齡青年的婚配問題成爲社會學研究的一個重要領域。
